wiki.content:
Vedder's cover of the song "Hard Sun" (originally written by Gordon Peterson who performed under the name of Indio on the 1989 album, Big Harvest) features backing vocals by Corin Tucker of Sleater-Kinney.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Vedder's cover of the song "Hard Sun" (originally written by Gordon Peterson who performed under the name of Indio on the 1989 album, Big Harvest) features backing vocals by Corin Tucker of Sleater-Kinney.

track.name: Hard Sun
comments: Love this song, love this album, love the movie, love the book. some of the best art ever made, and one of the most inspirational true stories. [3]
Love this song, love this album, love the movie, love the book. some of the best art ever made, and one of the most inspirational true stories. [2]
Can't get enough of this song...
i'm not  much of a pearl jam fan, but this is a great song.
I love Eddie Vedder, I love this movie, I love Christopher, I love this book, I love Jon Krakauer, I love Sean Penn. I love everything about Into The Wild.
Love this song, love this album, love the movie, love the book. some of the best art ever made, and one of the most inspirational true stories.
One of the BEST inspirational songs EVER.
When I walk beside her I am the better man... [4]
Greatest song from a biographical film, ever.
